person.persName: Thompson Archer Lyon (Hopkins County, KY, retired merchant )

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, retired merchant. Eddyville, Kentucky, native. Son of Chittenden Lyon and Frances Baker Lyon. Married to Julia Frost Lyon. Father of Ada Lyon, Wallace Lyon, and Julia Lyon. Student in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Retired merchant in Madisonville in 1860.
